text: Lake Brook is a river in Otsego County, New York. It begins in an unnamed field northwest of the Village of Laurens and flows south before flowing into Lake of the Twin Fawns. It then exits the lake and flows southeast before flowing into Gilbert Lake. After exiting Gilbert Lake it continues flowing southeast before converging with the Otego Creek east of Laurens. ==References== Category:Rivers of New York (state) Category:Rivers of Otsego County, New York
title: Lake Brook (Otego Creek tributary)
